name: Fab-u-lous Refried Beans!
author: Baker101
summary: Unlike the mush of brown on your plate at the restaurant, these beans have color, texture, and FRESH ingredients! Literally as easy as 1-2-3! Feel free to top with cheese or cilantro!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Heat olive oil in a nonstick pan; cook and stir red onion, cilantro, garlic, and chili powder until onion is softened, about 5 minutes
Cook and stir pinto beans and about 2/3 cup chicken broth into onion mixture until heated through, about 5 minutes
Mash pinto beans with the back of a spoon
Add remaining chicken broth and simmer until desired consistency
